actions.label: Network
actions.name: network
actions.description: Network to execute API: Test or Real

options.label: Get Exchange Information
options.name: getExchangeInfo
options.description: Get current exchange trading rules and symbol information.

options.label: Get Compressed, Aggregate Trades
options.name: getAggTrades
options.description: Get compressed, aggregate trades. Trades that fill at the time, from the same taker order, with the same price will have the quantity aggregated.

options.label: Get Kline/Candlestick data
options.name: getKlines
options.description: Kline/candlestick bars for a symbol. Klines are uniquely identified by their open time.

options.label: Get Current Average Price
options.name: getAvgPrice
options.description: Current average price for a symbol.

options.label: Get 24hr Ticker Price Change Statistics
options.name: get24hrTickerPrice
options.description: 24 hour rolling window price change statistics.

options.label: Get Symbol Price Ticker
options.name: getTickerPrice
options.description: Latest price for a symbol or symbols.

options.label: Get Symbol Order Book Ticker
options.name: getBookTicker
options.description: Best price/qty on the order book for a symbol or symbols.

inputParameters.label: From Id
inputParameters.name: fromId
inputParameters.description: ID to get aggregate trades from INCLUSIVE.
